root: ^Camilla: I swallowed the pill. It didn't help. I don't feel like.. I don't think it did anything.

StartChoices: ^Hold on, I need to rewire some of your hardware first, I think.
Rewire: ^Camilla: Rewire away. I'm at the end of my line here. I don't think I'm built for this. I can't do this.
RewireChoices: ^Don't give up at the finish line.
Stronger: ^Camilla: Am I? What about me is strong? I'm frail, I'm crazy, I can't hold down a meal, I'm a fish from the waist down. I've always been pushed to the fringe. I've never been strong. Just myself.
Finish: ^Camilla: I can only take so much. I've never been a fighter. And this has been a never-ending fight. Ever since I was little, I would hide or run, not fight. I can't escape it.
Time: ^Camilla: I don't have time. Running out of time.
TimeChoices: ^Stay focused on what you still have.
Focused: ^I don't have anything. I just.. I just ramble and I wander and I can't remember anything. I don't even know my mother's name, I just see her face.
Remember: ^Camilla: I.. I don't know. Not really anything. I'm me. I've lived here a while I think. I was an only child. I remember that.

b: ^Focus on her, tell me about that.
^It's good to focus on your history.

Repair_Success2: ^Camilla: I remember my mother. Her face when she saw my tail. Oh, it could've killed her! She.. hmm.. She said...
Repair_Fail: ^Camilla: I... I can't. I can't remember anything. Whoever I was when I decided to be this is slipping away if not already gone. I can't think of my mother, my father, anything. They're like old stories to me now. Images and concepts, fading fast.
